top.name: Braden Smith
top.blurb: Best player in the country. Nothing more to be said.

top.name: Jaxon Kohler
top.blurb: Jeremy Fears Jr. might be the leader of this team, but Jaxon Kohler is the engine.

top.name: Bennett Stirtz
top.blurb: Struggled against MSU but he will adjust.

top.name: Yaxel Lendeborg
top.blurb: Will be unguardable if he can shoot close to 40% from three.

top.name: Trey Kaufman-Renn
top.blurb: Tough game against Iowa State but still an elite player in this conference.
